title: Heelies Shoe Ecom
description: Online shoe store offering footwear for men, women, and children.
detailedContent:
Overview

Heelies is a sleek and responsive shoe e-commerce app built using Flutter. It allows users to browse, search, and purchase shoes across multiple categories including men’s, women’s, and children’s footwear.

Key Features

  • Product listing with filters and categories
  • Product detail page with image gallery
  • Shopping cart and order management
  • Secure user authentication

Tech Stack

  • Flutter
  • Node.js (backend)
  • MongoDB (database)

title: FixMasters
description: Connects users with handymen for services and bookings.
detailedContent:
Overview

FixMasters is a handyman service booking app that connects users with nearby service providers such as plumbers, electricians, and more.

Key Features

  • User-friendly service booking system
  • Chat feature between users and handymen
  • Push notifications for updates
  • Handymen can manage gigs and view booking status

Tech Stack

  • Flutter
  • Firebase Firestore
  • Firebase Authentication
  • Local Notifications

title: Convo Chat-App
description: Messaging app for seamless communication across the globe.
detailedContent:
Overview

Convo is a real-time chat application inspired by modern messengers like Telegram. It supports text messaging, user authentication, and live conversations.

Key Features

  • One-on-one chat with real-time updates
  • User authentication and profile setup
  • Typing indicators and message read receipts (coming soon)

Tech Stack

  • Flutter
  • Firebase Firestore
  • Firebase Authentication
